attributes.action: Require all M.P.'s to pay back all expenses claimed under their 'broken' expenses rules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P.’s are freely admitting that their expenses claim rules are broken. We the undersigned would therefore like all the money claimed under this broken system to be paid back.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
